item.title: YouTube Short Video - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to make a short basketball camp promo video.

I like this overall style with maybe some background music. https://youtube.com/shorts/UV9okdkViFQ?si=g84lxI3H8lSa4cVh

Can use background music like on this video https://youtube.com/shorts/K5qnBeoCbjM?si=BAgWhrm80SowNwq4

Would start with the guy talking and then show training clips and end with him talking. Him talking would run through the clips.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 15, 2024 17:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
